article_title: Bevin announces solution for Guard members’ tuition aid
article_text:
Universities will pick up cost for spring semester and be reimbursed later

Governor praises cooperation from university presidents and Senate, House leaders

Bevin also offers opinion on subjects ranging from taxes to state parks

article_metadata.news-keywords: kentucky, governor, gov, matt, bevin, speech, kentucky, chamber, lexington, national, guard, college, university, tuition, aid, presidents, senate, house, leaders, legislature, legislative, session, 2016, general, assembly, bipartisan, cooperation
article_metadata.description: In what he praised as the first major, bipartisan agreement in his new administration, Gov. Matt Bevin announced Monday that a way has been found to provide tuition for about 700 more Kentucky National Guard members to attend college in the upcoming spring semester.
article_metadata.title: Bevin announces solution for Guard members’ tuition aid | Lexington Herald-Leader
